byline.original: By ROD NORDLAND and JAWAD SUKHANYAR
byline.contributor: Taimoor Shah contributed reporting from Kandahar, Afghanistan.

lead_paragraph: One victim was killed in her yard in what was apparently an honor killing; the other execution was captured on a video.

headline.main: Taliban Publicly Execute Two Women in Northern Afghanistan

snippet: One victim was killed in her yard in what was apparently an honor killing; the other execution was captured on a video.
abstract: Afghani officials say Taliban insurgents are behind public execution of two women in Jowzjan Province, one is apparent honor killing and the other took place months ago, yet video of killing has recently surfaced.
